Package cz.praguecityuniversity

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    ConfigurationReader
    Interface allowing multiple implementations of reading a config file
    EventHandler
    Every Entity that works with events has to implement handleEvent to be able to process its events through the EventScheduler.
    IPAddress
    Interface allowing for multiple IP protocols.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    CabledConnection
    Cabled connection that can be attached to an ethernet network adapter on each side.
    ConfigurationReaderXML
    Configuration reader for XML files.
    Connection
    Connection between devices.
    ConnectionDecorator
    Allows for decorating of connections.
    CorruptConnection
    Corrupts the message going through a connection.
    Device
    Implementation of Device
    DeviceFactory
    Creates relevant Device implementation.
    DropConnection  
    Entity
    Abstract Class Entity that assigns type of entity to each component of the network
    EthernetNetworkAdapter
    Ethernet Network Adapter of the Device
    Event
    Implementation of the event
    EventLogger
    Provides basic logging utilities for events.
    EventScheduler
    Responsible for scheduling and then calling the relevant event handlers.
    Frame
    Layer 2 frame that has a header containing source and destination MAC addresses and a message.
    IPAddressFactory
    Creates relevant IPAddress implementation.
    IPMessage
    IP message that extends an abstract class Message
    IPProtocol
    Responsible for routing events
    IPv4
    IPv4 implementation.
    IPv6  
    Main  
    Message
    Abstract class Message for differentiating messages
    PortInterface
    Port interface of a network adapter.
    Simulation
    Responsible for loading and running the simulation.
    WirelessConnection
    Placeholder for a wireless connection implementation.
    WirelessNetworkAdapter
    Placeholder for a wireless network adapter implementation.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    EmptyRoutingTable
    Thrown when route is removed from the empty routing table
    EventFinished
    Thrown when this is the last event to be processed
    InvalidIPAddress
    Thrown when an Invalid IP address is provided to IPAddressFactory.
    InvalidMask
    Thrown when the provided IP mask isn't within the correct range.
    InvalidPortInterface
    Thrown on incorrect initialization of a port interface.
    IPVersionNotRecognized
    Thrown when IP address does not match IPv4 or IPv6 protocols.
    NotImplemented
    Thrown for components that are not yet implemented.
    RouteNotFound
    Thrown when a route to the specified destination IP address is not found.
